A total 45 patient enrol multi-centre , phase II , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 3-arm protocol . Up seven centre across Canada participate . Consented study participant meet eligibility criterion screen period schedule undergo apheresis . Following successful apheresis collection receipt cell sample cell manufacture facility , randomization take place though web-based system .
